teaser: Lizzie O’Leary, a correspondent and fill-in host for Marketplace (our sister show), tells us about a monster turtle terrorizing a small town and the charmingly old-fashioned efforts the townsfolk are undertaking to capture her. And, no, this really isn’t a fairy tale.
title: Lotti the Lake Turtle and the Village Blacksmith

description: Lizzie O’Leary, a correspondent and fill-in host for Marketplace (our sister show), tells us about a monster turtle terrorizing a small town and the charmingly old-fashioned efforts the townsfolk are undertaking to capture her. And, no, this really isn’t a fairy tale.
contentencoded:
Lizzie O’Leary, a correspondent and fill-in host for Marketplace (our sister show), tells us about a monster turtle terrorizing a small town and the charmingly old-fashioned efforts the townsfolk are undertaking to capture her.


And, no, this really isn’t a fairy tale.
